title: Could the iPhone 14 lineup mark the return of the ‘Plus’ branding?
content:
As we’ve covered a number of times already, expectations for the iPhone 14 lineup are pretty clear. Apple is likely to unveil four different iPhone 14 models across two screen sizes at 6.1-inches and 6.7-inches.

While Apple (usually) does a great job at keeping marketing names under wraps until a product is announced, it’s fun to speculate ahead of time. Something I’ve been pondering recently is whether the iPhone 14 lineup could mark the return of the “Plus” branding…

more…

The post Could the iPhone 14 lineup mark the return of the ‘Plus’ branding? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has four new iPhone 14 models coming this year, including a big screen model priced at $900. Could it be an iPhone 14 Plus?
